properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.amazon-cw-client
properties.description: To use the AmazonCloudWatch as the client. The option is a software.amazon.awssdk.services.cloudwatch.CloudWatchClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.configuration
properties.description: The component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.aws2.cw.Cw2Configuration type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the aws2-cw component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.health-check-consumer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all consumer based health checks from this component

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.health-check-producer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all producer based health checks from this component. Notice: Camel has by default disabled all producer based health-checks. You can turn on producer checks globally by setting camel.health.producersEnabled=true.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.name
properties.description: The metric name

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.override-endpoint
properties.description: Set the need for overriding the endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with the uriEndpointOverride option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.profile-credentials-name
properties.description: If using a profile credentials provider, this parameter will set the profile name

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.proxy-host
properties.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the CW client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.proxy-port
properties.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the CW client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.proxy-protocol
properties.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the CW client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.region
properties.description: The region in which CW client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example, ap-east-1) You'll need to use the name Region.EU_WEST_1.id()

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.session-token
properties.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume an IAM role

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.timestamp
properties.description: The metric timestamp

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.trust-all-certificates
properties.description: If we want to trust all certificates in case of overriding the endpoint

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.unit
properties.description: The metric unit

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.uri-endpoint-override
properties.description: Set the overriding uri endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.use-default-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the S3 client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.use-profile-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the Cloudwatch client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.use-session-credentials
properties.description: Set whether the CloudWatch client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in a situation in which the user needs to assume an IAM role for doing operations in CloudWatch.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-cw.value
properties.description: The metric value
